scene_target: Artie completes character creation with a glitched build.
goal: Finalize the 'Crit-Only' build and introduce Fizz.
conflict: Artie's confusion and frustration versus Fizz's bureaucratic indifference and snark.
end_condition: Artie's HP is set to 1 and he is locked into the Crit-Only build.

last_scene: Artie Penhaligon encountered the System Guide Fizz in the Character Creation Void after his death.
A UI error allowed Artie to accidentally dump all his stat points into Critical Rate, locking his health at 1 HP.
The System finalized the 'Crit-iculous' build, and Fizz prepared to send Artie to the tutorial zone.
key_events: Artie met Fizz, a Class C System Guide, in the white void.
Artie accidentally allocated all 50 stat points to Critical Rate due to a UI overflow error.
The System locked Artie's build with 1 HP and 100% Crit Rate.
Artie received the 'Statistical Anomaly' title and the 'Glitched: Crit-Only' status effect.
Fizz consulted 'The Noob's Guide to Not Dying' but found no solution for the glitched build.
Fizz stowed her sparkling guide wand in her belt as the portal to the Whispering Woods opened.
